room_title: Escape room "Murder! Mystery" by Escape NE Ohio in Warren
review: We stopped in and did the Murder! Room had a great time. It was appropriately challenging and fun to do with a group of friends. The story was entertaining and made you think!

room_title: Escape room "Murder! Mystery" by Escape NE Ohio in Warren
review: The murder room was a terrific time with my kids! We had a blast and highly recommend this fun little adventure! What a great bonding time! Thank you!!

room_title: Escape room "Murder! Mystery" by Escape NE Ohio in Warren
review: Went with my friends and we had a great time! Definitely makes you think outside the box. I recommend to everyone that you stop down and try the rooms out! We did the Murder room, and I can't wait to stop back and try the Pirate Ship room!
